text:
Hi, I am getting some strange errors from setup-julia with julia version `~1.6.0-0` but only for macOS: the `setup-julia` step takes about 30 minutes (very long timeout?) and then fails with `Error: Unexpected HTTP response: 403`
e.g. here <https://github.com/oscar-system/Polymake.jl/runs/2134368512?check_suite_focus=true#logs>
So I had a look at the versions.json, there are plenty of 1.6.0-rc3 links in there but all of them give `ERROR 403: Forbidden` when trying to download then. Interestingly setup-julia still seems to be able to install 1.6.0-rc3 on `ubuntu-latest`, wherever that file is coming from ...?
(First try about 7-8 hours ago, then I did a retry about 2 hours ago and still got the same errors)
